body_html:
I also installed PyTorch 0.2.0 form Anaconda and torch.optim.lr_scheduler isn't available (Though according to release notes and documentation it should be there).

I typed torch.__version__ and the result was 0.2.0_0.

Thank You.

body:
I also installed PyTorch 0.2.0 form Anaconda and `torch.optim.lr_scheduler` isn't available (Though according to release notes and documentation it should be there).

I typed `torch.__version__` and the result was `0.2.0_0`.

Thank You.
